backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the loan document generator backend with user profile management, global/custom template CRUD, document storage, and loan processing records, using access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (loan form UI, template designer, document preview, PDF generation) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short descriptions for every frontend source file, serving as a quick-reference index of each module's purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom property color tokens for light and dark modes covering background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Loan Document Generator' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the Vite module entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component wiring Internet Identity authentication, user profile fetching, template management, and form state together with the header, FormSection, PreviewDialog, TemplateDesigner, and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Loan form component with card-based sections for document type selection, applicant details, loan parameters with live EMI calculation, bank account fields, and dynamic custom key-value fields, plus validation-gated generate button.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: A purely visual overlay component that renders template decorations (background image, watermark, seal, and signature) on top of a document preview canvas.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: A modal dialog that renders a document template with form data as a JPEG preview image, and provides Download and Share buttons to export the document as a PDF.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A non-dismissible dialog that collects a user's name and optional email on first use, saving the profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A dialog-based template management UI that lists built-in and custom templates, and allows users to create, edit, and delete custom document templates including logo/background uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with `localStorage`, initializing from stored JSON and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and custom templates against the ICP backend actor, with error handling for template operation results.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: Custom React hook that manages built-in and custom loan document templates, providing CRUD operations with localStorage persistence via helper functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines light/dark theme CSS custom properties using OKLCH color values.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser file download for a given Blob by creating and clicking a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Exports a standard EMI calculation function using principal, annual interest rate, and tenure, plus an Indian-locale currency formatter.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a single-page PDF Blob from a template and form data by rendering to a canvas, converting to JPEG, and manually constructing a minimal PDF-1.4 binary structure.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimension constants at 96 DPI along with margin, header, footer, and content area measurements used for PDF rendering.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a loan document template with form data onto an HTML Canvas element, drawing the header, watermark, title, body text with wrapping, and footer sections.
frontend/src/lib/qr/qrPayload.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for QR code payload generation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qr/renderQr.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for QR code rendering utilities.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Utility that uses the Web Share API to share a PDF Blob as a file attachment, returning false if sharing is unsupported or fails.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader, rejecting non-image files.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Maps a PositionPreset string enum to corresponding React inline CSS style objects for positioning elements within a container.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Defines and exports the five built-in loan document templates (home, personal, vehicle, business, education) and helpers for loading/saving custom templates from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Processes a template's headline and body by replacing Handlebars-style placeholders with computed form data values, including a calculated EMI.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data, checking required fields and numeric constraints for name, loan amount, interest rate, tenure, processing charge, and custom fields.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and constants for the loan application form, including FormData, CustomField, LoanType, and default form values.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for document templates, including Template, OverlayAsset, SignatureAsset, and layout/position enums.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom CSS-variable-based colors, Inter/Playfair Display fonts, border radii, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's current state including completed frontend features (form UI, template designer, PDF generation, auth) and a pending backend task to build a Motoko actor for user/template/document management.
